Class manageHotelModel

java.lang.Object
manageHotelModel
public class manageHotelModel extends Object
Model class for managing hotels

      Parameters:
      h - - Instance of Hotel that contains the reservations to edit
      roomNum - - Threshold for room numbers of reservations
      ctr - - Number of room numbers to move

    • isSameReservation

      public boolean isSameReservation(Hotel h, Reservation r, int checkIn, int checkOut, int room)
      Checks if the days are booked in a hotel, not including a certain Reservation r Preconditions: h is an instance of Hotel, r is an instance of Reservation, checkIn, checkOut, and room are integers Postconditions: returns a boolean
      Parameters:
      h - - Instance of Hotel
      r - - Instance of Reservation
      checkIn - - The check-in date
      checkOut - - The check-out date
      room - - The room number
      Returns:
      boolean - True if the days are booked, false otherwise

    • findAvailableRoom

      public boolean findAvailableRoom(Hotel h, Reservation r, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      Finds the first available room of a certain hotel during specific check-in and check-out dates. Preconditions: h and r are initialized, r is in h, checkIn and checkOut are valid integers Postconditions: Reservation r's check-in, check-out and total price will be edited if there is an available room, else nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      h - - hotel to check the reservations
      r - - reservation to be edited
      checkIn - - new check-in date
      checkOut - - new check-out date
      Returns:
      true if an available room was found, else returns false

    • editRoomType

      public boolean editRoomType(Hotel h, int roomType, Reservation r)
      Edits the room type of a specific reservation if possible.
      Parameters:
      h - - hotel that the reservation is in
      roomType - - room type of the reservation (0 - standard, 1 - deluxe, 2 - executive)
      r - - reservation to be edited
      Returns:
      true if reservation was successfully edited, else returns false
